title: Drum Set
desc:
*Ba-dum-tiss!*

In addition to providing 10 defense, equipping this will cause you to beat your drums into the start of every battle!

Every battle you begin will additionally drain 5 HP from you, if you have over 5. As long as you do, you will also start the battle with 💛 Absorption 10, acting as a 10 HP shield against damage.

Excess Absorption vanishes at the end of the battle, so consider carefully if you really want to use this shield or not. It helps tremendously when you damage is slow, but makes 1-turn battles much more draining than normal.
